com.tingyik90.snackprogressbar

Class SnackProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tingyik90.snackprogressbar.SnackProgressBar

  • public class SnackProgressBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class containing the display information of SnackProgressBar to be displayed via SnackProgressBarManager.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SnackProgressBar.OnActionClickListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an action is clicked.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TYPE_ACTION
      SnackProgressBar layout with message and action button.
      static int TYPE_DETERMINATE
      SnackProgressBar layout with message, determinate progressBar and progress percentage.
      static int TYPE_INDETERMINATE
      SnackProgressBar layout with message and indeterminate progressBar.
      static int TYPE_MESSAGE
      SnackProgressBar layout with message only.

    • Method Detail

      • setAction

        public SnackProgressBar setAction(@NonNull
                                  java.lang.String action,
                                  SnackProgressBar.OnActionClickListener onActionClickListener)
        Sets the action of SnackProgressBar. Only will be shown for TYPE_ACTION.
        Parameters:
        action - Action to be displayed.

      • setAllowUserInput

        public SnackProgressBar setAllowUserInput(boolean allowUserInput)
        Sets whether user input is allowed. Setting to FALSE will display an OverlayLayout which blocks user input.
        Parameters:
        allowUserInput - Whether to allow user input. Default = FALSE.

      • setIconBitmap

        public SnackProgressBar setIconBitmap(@NonNull
                                      android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Sets the icon of SnackProgressBar.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap of icon.

      • setIconResource

        public SnackProgressBar setIconResource(@DrawableRes
                                        int iconResId)
        Sets the icon of SnackProgressBar.
        Parameters:
        iconResId - The resource identifier of the icon to be displayed.

      • setMessage

        public SnackProgressBar setMessage(@NonNull
                                   java.lang.String message)
        Sets the message of SnackProgressBar.
        Parameters:
        message - Message of SnackProgressBar.

      • setProgressMax

        public SnackProgressBar setProgressMax(int progressMax)
        Sets the max progress for determinate ProgressBar. Only will be shown for TYPE_DETERMINATE.
        Parameters:
        progressMax - Max progress for determinate ProgressBar. Default = 100.

      • setShowProgressPercentage

        public SnackProgressBar setShowProgressPercentage(boolean showProgressPercentage)
        Sets whether to show progress in percentage. Only will be shown for TYPE_DETERMINATE.
        Parameters:
        showProgressPercentage - Whether to show progressText. Default = TRUE.

      • setSwipeToDismiss

        public SnackProgressBar setSwipeToDismiss(boolean swipeToDismiss)
        Sets whether user can swipe to dismiss. Swipe to dismiss only works for TYPE_ACTION and TYPE_MESSAGE.
        Parameters:
        swipeToDismiss - Whether user can swipe to dismiss. Default = FALSE.

      • setType

        public void setType(int type)
        Sets the type of SnackProgressBar.
        Parameters:
        type - SnackProgressBar of either TYPE_ACTION, TYPE_DETERMINATE, TYPE_INDETERMINATE or TYPE_MESSAGE
